events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and logged their details into our system for review.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering, specifically for a backend developer role, based on their skills and experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process and coordinate next steps.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s engineering background and motivation for the software developer position.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the role and confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for 10 days from now with the lead developer to evaluate the candidate’s software development skills.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with their problem-solving abilities and coding expertise.
An HR interview is scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations following the positive technical assessment.
The HR interview concluded positively with the candidate aligning well with organizational values and compensation requirements.
An official job offer for the software engineer role was extended to the candidate, detailing salary, benefits, and start date options.
The candidate responded with positive feedback on the offer, requesting clarification on a few benefits before final confirmation.
The candidate accepted the job offer formally and confirmed their excitement to join the engineering team and contribute immediately.
The onboarding process has started successfully with the candidate completing all initial documentation and orientation sessions.
The recruitment process is now closed with the new software engineer fully integrated into the team and ready for upcoming projects.
